But as you say - if Jenkins is green, everything's OK.

nodes.bodyText:
Found the culprit.
This time I was much quicker than prod guys :) 7.44.0.Final is not released yet and revapi by default skips check if it cannot download the desired artifact. I will configure it to fail (tested locally), so it doesn't happen anymore. Now we just need to wait till next week, so it is released. Thanks for spotting it.
nodes.diffHunk:
